question:
Which of the following is equal to \((x - 2)^2 + (x - 1)^2 + x^2 + (x + 1)^2 + (x + 2)^2\)?
(A) \(5x^2\)
(B) \(5x^2 + 10\)
(C) \(x^2 + 10\)
(D) \(5x^2 + 6x + 10\)
(E) \(5x^2 - 6x + 10\)
